isis.stitle: Recall 05519 Reminder Notice - Driver's Seat Belt Tethers on certain 5500i, 5600i, and 9200i Models built 8/23/2004 thru 9/13/2005

recall.subject: Driver's Seat Belt Tethers on certain 5500i, 5600i, and 9200i Models built 8/23/2004 thru 9/13/2005

defect.para: THIS IS AN ISIS ONLY NOTIFICATION.
Please refer to the dealer letter G-05519 for service instructions.

para.exhotlnk: Print ready (PDF file) copy of the dealer letter

defect.para: When certain Sears Atlas seats are in their lowest, most rearward adjusted position they may chafe the seat belt tether that connects from the seat to the back of the cab. This chafing may eventually cut through the tether, thus weakening the effectiveness of the seat belt assembly in a vehicle crash, possibly resulting in property damage, personal injury, or death.

ownernote.para: This letter is to inform you that the owners of suspect vehicles who have not completed the Recall Service Procedure have been sent a reminder to schedule an appointment to have the service performed.
We appreciate your patience and cooperation regarding this campaign and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
